title: Blue Streak.DVDRip.XviD-PePPage
description: Miles Logan is a jewel thief. Things go awry while he&#039;s stealing a huge diamond in downtown L.A.: a thief, Deacon, tries a double-cross, the police arrive, and Miles is arrested, but not before he hides the jewel in an air duct of a building under construction. Two years&#039; later, he&#039;s out of prison and he heads for the site: it&#039;s L.A.&#039;s new police headquarters! Posing as a reassigned cop, Miles gets into the building, but before he can recover the swag, he&#039;s partnered with a naive detective and sent out to investigate burglaries. With Deacon on his trail, he must recover the diamond, keep the cops fooled, and do a few good deeds as a detective who can think like a criminal.
